import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import countries from "i18n-iso-countries"; import { getCountries, getCities } from "countries-cities"; // Đăng ký tiếng Việt countries.registerLocale(require("i18n-iso-countries/langs/vi.json")); const AddressList = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [selectedCountry, setSelectedCountry] = useState(""); const [cities, setCities] = useState([]); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); // Load thành phố khi chọn quốc gia useEffect(() => { if (selectedCountry) { const cityList = getCities(selectedCountry); // Mã ISO2: "VN", "US", "FR"... setCities(cityList || []); } }, [selectedCountry]); return (

); }; export default AddressList;
